title: My Key Is Gone From My Inventory
body: I crafted a key started oppening a box,it said i was disconected so i just had a black screen nothing popping out of the case. I reloged and nothing was there, the key and box were gone. So i just wanna ask wtf?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you received the following from that chest:

>150 Orange Essence
Blood Moon Kennen Summoner Icon

We've seen some issues with crashing during Hextech Crafting that was caused by some recent Windows updates. Make sure you've installed the most recent [windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/) available.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
